job_tasks.phrase: Denk je mee met opdrachtgevers over het implementeren van machine learning modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in understanding client needs and translating them into actionable ML implementations.

job_tasks.phrase: Pas je verschillende vormen van Machine Learning toe in de contexten van beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie en Recommending Systems alsmede nieuwe en andere vormen van ML en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions applying various ML techniques and building them into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: participeer je in projecten waar generatieve AI wordt gebruikt. Je implementeert daar ook oplossingen met retrieval-augmented generation of andere relevante technieken in de context van generatieve AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to implementing solutions using generative AI, including RAG, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouw, implementeer, verbeter en onderhoud je AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (apps, webservices, en evt. andere frontends etc.).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes building, implementing, and maintaining AI solutions within applications, which is core software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Zorg je voor de vertaling van complexe Machine Learning naar bruikbare applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the software development task of making complex ML models accessible and usable in applications.

job_tasks.phrase: het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the integration of ML solutions into existing software, a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouw je model training scripts en data pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions building data pipelines, a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Ben je bezig met het verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en met verbindingen maken met data bronnen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes data preprocessing and connection to data sources, which are data engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: verbeter en onderhoud je AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: The 'onderhoud' (maintenance) aspect of implemented solutions points towards operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Het gebruiken van diverse mobiele AI frameworks
job_tasks.justification: Using AI frameworks for development falls under the software development category.

job_tasks.phrase: Je implementeert daar ook oplossingen met retrieval-augmented generation of andere relevante technieken in de context van generatieve AI.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing RAG and other generative AI techniques involves software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: ambitieuze machine learning engineer en wil je AI inzetten voor een verbetere dienstverlening van de Nederlandse overheid?
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on leveraging AI for improved public service, showing business context alignment.
Maintenance of models is a key aspect of productionizing and maintaining software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Geef je samen met de AI architect presentaties over AI.
job_tasks.justification: Presenting on AI solutions is a communication aspect related to the developed technology.

soft_skills.phrase: Zorg je voor de vertaling van complexe Machine Learning naar bruikbare applicaties.
Denk je mee in vraagstukken rondom kaders en ethiek binnen de context van artificial intelligence.
Geef je samen met de AI architect presentaties over AI.
nieuwe en andere vormen van ML

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes the development and implementation of solutions using generative AI, including RAG and various ML techniques like NLP and speech generation. It also highlights building these into production-ready applications, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
